entry.title: WIND WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 2:41 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
